text: jyare ibrahime kahyum he palanahara! Tum a jagyane santivalu sahera banava ane ahinyana rahevasi'one je allaha ta'ala para ane kayamatana divasa para imana dharavanara hoya phaloni roji apa. Allaha ta'ala'e pharamavyum hum inkari'one pana thodoka phayado apisa, pachi te'one agani yatana tarapha lacara kari da'isa, a jagya kharaba che
